# Frame Delay

**API Collection**

Indicates that no limit should be placed on the compression window.

## Constants

- **kVTUnlimitedFrameDelayCount**: Indicates that no limit should be set on the compression window.

items.description: Indicates that no limit should be set on the compression window.
